p: While functionalizing ILs and introducing electroactive species is relatively straightforward, and might be easily accomplished using the common preparative methods for the synthesis of TSILs, [ 31] developing RAILs add other requirements, which make their preparation very challenging. As a matter of fact, it is well known that a fairly narrow range of ILs structures are liquids at RT, and only a very few of the reported RAILs are liquids at RT [ 15, 19, 23, 25, 32, 33], as illustrated in Table 1.
